title: Mexico's president downplays Trump's threats
subhed: Though the US and Mexico signed a security agreement in September 2025, and drug seizures and arrests in Mexico have increased, on Thursday, Donald Trump floated the idea of strikes against Mexican cartels.

title: Iran's bloody and concealed crackdown

US announces 'large-scale' strikes against IS in Syria
subhed: The strikes carried out on Saturday were part of Operation Hawkeye Strike, which was launched 'in direct response to the deadly ISIS attack on US and Syrian forces in Palmyra,' US Central Command said in a statement on X, using an acronym for the jihadist group.

title: When the damage caused by alcohol begins in utero
subhed: Drinking alcoholic beverages during pregnancy can trigger more or less severe neurodevelopmental and growth disorders. Recent studies also show that fathers' alcohol consumption prior to conception may play a harmful role as well.

title: In Los Angeles, one year after the fires: 'I will only live here if the neighborhood is rebuilt to withstand fire'
subhed: One year after massive wildfires devastated the southern coast of California, residents are laser-focused on rebuilding. But as they weigh the need for speed against the desire to build back better, they confront questions about the best way to preserve their quality of life.

title: 'Don't forget you saved my life': Letter to the stranger who gave me their bone marrow
subhed: Hélène Schlesinger was 37 and had a husband, two children, and plenty of plans for the future when she learned, in 2022, that she had leukemia. For months, the young woman fought as she waited for a bone marrow transplant. She lives thanks to an anonymous donor. All she knows is that he is German and that a part of him now lives inside her.

subhed: Political analyst Hamzeh Safavi, whose father is an adviser to Supreme Leader Ali Khamenei, discusses the abduction of Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro by the US on January 3 in Caracas, and its impact on the Islamic Republic.

title: Trump-Colombia tensions thaw after months of heated exchanges
subhed: After threatening and insulting Colombian leader Gustavo Petro, the US president unexpectedly invited him to the White House.

title: 'Love Is Blind: France' contestants sue over 'inhuman or degrading treatment' during filming
subhed: Three participants in the French version of Netflix reality TV show have brought their case before a Paris-region labor court, claiming they were deprived of their personal freedoms during the filming of the show.
